languages.text: "У меня больше нет на него права". {n}Металлические пальцы тянутся к голове кибермастифа, но замирают в волоске от нее.{/n} "Доставь его к маршалу — он найдет Глейто нового хозяина".

"I don't have the right to keep him anymore." {n}He reaches his metal fingers toward the cyber-mastiff's head, but stops just short of touching it.{/n} "Deliver him to the Marshal. He'll find Glaito a new master."
languages.original_text: "У меня больше нет на него права". {n}Металлические пальцы тянутся к голове кибермастифа, но замирают в волоске от нее.{/n} "Доставь его к маршалу — он найдет Глейто нового хозяина".

traits.locale_text: "I do not have the right to keep him anymore." {n}The metallic fingers reach for the cyber-mastiff's head, but stop just short of caressing it.{/n} "Deliver him to the Marshal, he'll find Glaito a new master."

"I do not have the right to keep him anymore." {n}The metallic fingers reach for the cyber-mastiff's head, but stop just short of caressing it.{/n} "Deliver him to the Marshal, he'll find Glaito a new master."

"I don't have the right to keep him anymore." {n}He reaches his metallic fingers toward the cyber-mastiff's head, but stops just short of caressing it.{/n} "Deliver him to the Marshal. He'll find Glaito a new master."

"I don't have the right to keep him anymore." {n}He reaches his metal fingers toward the cyber-mastiff's head, but stops just short of touching it.{/n} "Deliver him to the Marshal. He'll find Glaito a new master."

"I don't have the right to keep him anymore." {n}He reaches his metal fingers toward the cyber-mastiff's head, but stops just short of touching it.{/n} "Deliver him to the Marshal. He'll find Glaito a new master."

languages.text: 「もう彼を手元に置く権利はない」{n}彼は金属の指をサイバーマスチフの頭に伸ばしたが、触れる直前で止めた。{/n}「彼を将帥に渡してくれ。彼がグライトに新しい主人を見つけてくれるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I don't have the right to keep him anymore." {n}He reaches his metal fingers toward the cyber-mastiff's head, but stops just short of touching it.{/n} "Deliver him to the Marshal. He'll find Glaito a new master."

traits.locale_text: 「もう彼を手元に置く権利はない」{n}彼は金属の指をサイバーマスチフの頭に伸ばしたが、触れる直前で止めた。{/n}「彼を将帥に渡してくれ。彼がグライトに新しい主人を見つけてくれるだろう」

languages.text: "Ich habe nicht länger das Recht, ihn zu behalten." {n}Er streckt seine Metallfinge nach dem Kopf des Cyber-Mastiff aus, hält aber im letzten Moment inne.{/n} "Bringt ihn zum Marschall. Er wird einen neuen Herren für Glaito finden."
languages.original_text: "I don't have the right to keep him anymore." {n}He reaches his metal fingers toward the cyber-mastiff's head, but stops just short of touching it.{/n} "Deliver him to the Marshal. He'll find Glaito a new master."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nicht länger das Recht, ihn zu behalten." {n}Er streckt seine Metallfinge nach dem Kopf des Cyber-Mastiff aus, hält aber im letzten Moment inne.{/n} "Bringt ihn zum Marschall. Er wird einen neuen Herren für Glaito finden."

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas en droit de le garder à mes côtés. » {n}Il approche sa main métallique de la tête du cyber-mastiff, mais s'interrompt avant de le toucher.{/n} « Restituez-le au maréchal. Il lui trouvera un nouveau maître. »
languages.original_text: "I don't have the right to keep him anymore." {n}He reaches his metal fingers toward the cyber-mastiff's head, but stops just short of touching it.{/n} "Deliver him to the Marshal. He'll find Glaito a new master."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas en droit de le garder à mes côtés. » {n}Il approche sa main métallique de la tête du cyber-mastiff, mais s'interrompt avant de le toucher.{/n} « Restituez-le au maréchal. Il lui trouvera un nouveau maître. »

languages.text: «Ya no tengo derecho a conservarlo». {n}Extiende sus dedos metálicos hacia la cabeza del cibermastín, pero se detiene justo antes de tocarla.{/n} «Lléveselo al mariscal. Él encontrará un nuevo amo para Glaito».
languages.original_text: "I don't have the right to keep him anymore." {n}He reaches his metal fingers toward the cyber-mastiff's head, but stops just short of touching it.{/n} "Deliver him to the Marshal. He'll find Glaito a new master."

traits.locale_text: «Ya no tengo derecho a conservarlo». {n}Extiende sus dedos metálicos hacia la cabeza del cibermastín, pero se detiene justo antes de tocarla.{/n} «Lléveselo al mariscal. Él encontrará un nuevo amo para Glaito».

languages.text: “我没有权利把它继续留在身边。”{n}他将金属手指伸向格雷托的头，但没有碰到它就停住了。{/n}“把它带到元帅那里吧，他会为格雷托找个新主人。”
languages.original_text: "I don't have the right to keep him anymore." {n}He reaches his metal fingers toward the cyber-mastiff's head, but stops just short of touching it.{/n} "Deliver him to the Marshal. He'll find Glaito a new master."

traits.locale_text: “我没有权利把它继续留在身边。”{n}他将金属手指伸向格雷托的头，但没有碰到它就停住了。{/n}“把它带到元帅那里吧，他会为格雷托找个新主人。”

languages.text: "Artık ona sahip olmaya hakkım yok." {n}Metal parmaklarını siber mastifin kafasına doğru uzatsa da son anda dokunmadan duruyor.{/n} "Onu Miralay'a götür. Glaito'ya yeni bir efendi bulacaktır."
languages.original_text: "I don't have the right to keep him anymore." {n}He reaches his metal fingers toward the cyber-mastiff's head, but stops just short of touching it.{/n} "Deliver him to the Marshal. He'll find Glaito a new master."

traits.locale_text: "Artık ona sahip olmaya hakkım yok." {n}Metal parmaklarını siber mastifin kafasına doğru uzatır ancak son anda dokunmadan durur.{/n} "Onu Miralay'a götür. Glaito'ya yeni bir efendi bulacaktır."
